statements: DELETE FROM stock_turnover_reports WHERE product_id = 100 AND turnover_rate > 0.5;
DELETE FROM stock_turnover_reports WHERE turnover_rate <= 0.2 AND product_id BETWEEN 200 AND 300;
DELETE FROM Sales WHERE sale_id = 200 AND item_id = 101;
DELETE FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM stock_reports WHERE stock_quantity < 1000 AND stock_price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM turnover WHERE turnover_rate < 0.5 AND turnover_id = 1000;
DELETE FROM stocks WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND quantity < 10;
